briefTitle: Fatigue Intervention Trial for Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: A Randomized Trial to Evaluate a Family-focused Mind Body Medicine Intervention to Reduce Fatigue Among Breast Cancer Survivors
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Stage I-III Breast Cancer
* At least 3 months since last breast cancer treatment (excluding hormonal therapy or Herceptin).
* 4 week history of persistent moderate to severe fatigue
* Competent to sign informed consent
* Willing to be randomized

Exclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic breast cancer
